dresses.name: Kanchipuram Silk Saree
dresses.description:
This exquisite saree features a deep black body beautifully contrasted with rich maroon accents and traditional gold zari-inspired geometric motifs, creating a striking yet graceful look. Temple Border (Traditional Thazhambu border) with modern plain black body

The classic pattern adds depth and character, making this saree a perfect choice for official meetings, conferences and special celebrations.

Fabric & Care Instructions

Pure silk is a natural, delicate fabric and deserves gentle care to retain its beauty.

Dry clean only (recommended for longevity)

Do not wash with water or machine wash

Avoid spraying perfume directly on the saree

Store in a cool, dry place, wrapped in a soft cotton or muslin cloth

Refold periodically to avoid permanent creases

dresses.name: Kanchipuram Silk Saree
dresses.description:
The saree features a vibrant, dual-tone teal green (or sea green) body that contrasts beautifully with a rich magenta-purple border and pallu.
The main body of the saree is dotted with small, delicate gold zari buttas (circular motifs), giving it a classic and elegant texture without being overpowering.
The bottom border is significantly wider and more ornate than the top border, creating a grand look when draped.
